Learn & connect

AI events and workshops

Mimer offers a variety of workshops and events to help you deepen your AI knowledge and connect with people from different fields. From how-to webinars and workshops, to networking events. 

Our sessions cover everything from Scaling AI to domain-specific applications.
Join us and boost your AI expertise and accelerate your projects.
